options.name: question
options.text: Will %s win by %d goals or more?

options.name: Label_GuideHome
options.text: You win if Borussia Monchenglabach wins, draw or loses by 3 goals or less.You lose half your bet if Borussia Monchenglabach loses by 4 goals.

options.name: Label_GuideAway
options.text: You win if Charlton wins, draw or loses by 3 goals or less.You lose half your bet if Charlton loses by 4 goals.
